content.detailedDescription: In backyard looked south saw 25+ white objects in sky. looked as if they were blinking in and out of view.. asked wife to come outside and confirm and she did. tried to take photos with iphone and seemed to far away. no clouds and no other aircraft seen in sky
content.summary: In backyard looked south saw 25+ white objects in clear blue sky called wife to confirm they moved south west then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were on our boat and watching meteor shower when we saw a series within 60 minutes three separate times grey like objects above 500 feet heading eastward over muskegon lake mi.  we thought it was birds but it wasnt it was a ufo sighting to our knowledge.  no lights but looked almost transparent.  our cameras quit working when this was happening.
content.summary: We saw over muskegon lake a series of grey looking objects moving eastward.  we thought they might be birds.  these weren't birds.  they gave off a very military appearance.  moved in a straight

content.detailedDescription:
On 11/13/2016 i went outside of my house to take photos of the super moon. the time stamp at the beginning of the series of photos was 6:57 pm and the last photo i took was time stamped at 9:16 pm. it was a nice night and visibility was good and the moon was bright.
i started in the front of my house looking toward the east and the back side of the house and looked at the moon with my eyes before i raised the camera for the first picture.  i used my iphone camera, and when i focused on the moon, i also saw an extra "spot " of light appear in the camera. i lowered my phone and didn't see the "spot" with my eyes. there is a street light behind me past my driveway and over my left shoulder as i was facing the moon. i took the photo and saw the "spot" in the photo with the moon. i had my reading glasses on and zoomed the photo out and saw the "spot" better: it was a blue orb! i thought it was funny because it made the moon look like it had its own little "moonlet" next to it!
i then got an alcohol lens wipe and cleaned the lens on my phone, because i thought the lens was dirty and maybe it was projecting something into the photo. well, each time i went back outside to take more photos during this approximately 3 hour time period, the blue orb would appear in the photos. i would lower the camera and not see it with the naked eye, but after taking the photos, it would reappear in my photos.  the number of pictures i took with the orb showing is 11, possibly 12.  the orb is in different positions in successive photos. it appears at the lower left of the moon, above the moon, to the right, etc.
i also took photos in my backyard where it was darker because i still thought maybe there was some light interference from the street.  my son suggested it could have been something he called "lens flare" which is something i don't know about.
there are 17 photos total and some are zoomed out, some are regular focus, and others show streaks or something like smudges of light for lack of a better description.
i thought it was cool, and i haven't seen the blue sphere show up again in any of my other recent photos to date.  i hope someone can analyze these and figure out what, if anything it was and how big it actually was and the distance from my house.
content.summary: Taking pics of super moon and saw blue orb thru camera. it appeared in almost every photo and in different places each time.

content.detailedDescription: Seven individuals including myself went to cheney lake to observe the annual perseid meteor shower. members of the group included a degreed meteorologist (myself) and an astronomy/physics senior in college. shortly after getting settled in, we observed a very bright object in the northeastern sky that would fade and brighten. at its brightest, it was about as bright as venus. all present observed it, were excited to see it and confused as to what it could be. the astronomy/physics major viewed it through his astronomical binoculars. as we watched, it sank slowly toward the horizon and moved slightly to the right in the sky. we saw many polar orbiter satellites as well as a couple of iridium flares throughout the 3 hours we were there, but this was markedly different. it almost appeared as an iridium satellite tumbling out of control, but the direction and speed of travel were wrong for such a thing. after about 10 minutes of observation, it faded below an observable level. what we witnessed could not be easily explained by anything we know about satellites or even space junk.
content.summary: Flashing and pulsing object with uneven intervals

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning from the bathroom in my residence at 3:30 am this morning and was just about ready to get into my bed. a super bright light came thru the slight slits in my black out blinds and startled me.I immediately opened the blinds to see where the light came from.I woke my wife up and asked her if she heard or saw anything and she said no.I never saw an object or anything else.
i called the inglewoodwood police to see if anyone reported anything happened at or around 3:35 this morning and got a no answer.

i remember that we have security cameras on all sides  of our house.I noted the time of 3:36am when i saw the lights this morning.
our cameras @3:36:49 show an extremely bright on the west side camera;dim light on the north side;bright lights on the south and east sides. there was no noise like a helicopter that i heard. the light lasted only a couple of seconds according to my cameras.
i did not feel nervous or upset when i saw the light.It was so bright i noticed it but did not see anything that caused it.The light went out as quickly as it appeared.
the light looked like it could be a helicopter or plane off course since lax is close by to the southwest, but there was no noise.The cameras show the light flashed twice  but in varying degrees of brightness on the 4 sides of my house.
content.summary: Super bright lights seen thru my black out blinds this morning after returning from bathroom.

content.detailedDescription: It happened when i was 4 or 5 years old. me and my mother were living in a small village. one evening my grandma came with her car to take us somewhere. it was pretty dark and i had just went outside to wait for my mom. my grandma was probably waiting in the car. so i was standing alone outside the door and suddenly i saw this thing speeding across the sky. it was like a shooting star only that it had two lights exactly next to each other. because of the tree around the area and how fast this thing was i saw it only for a second before it vanished behind the trees. of course i immediately called my mom but it was already too late when she got out. it´s been years now and still don´t what it was. it could have been a some sort of plane but the problem is that there wasn´t any sound. it just appeared and then the next second it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo fast like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
We were visiting lyme park in disley, uk on 13th august 2017. it was a sunny day with only some high cirrus-clouds at the time.

we sat down in the garden to look at the estate and took some pictures. after laying down in the grass i looked up in the sky. there was a plane flying by at high altitude. far behind it i saw what appeared to be a bright star. this was odd, because it was about 3:45 pm and no moon nor stars where otherwise visible. 

the star changed in brightness which was unusual, because at first there were no cirrusclouds in front of it and still de brightness changed. perhaps it was a sattelite or the iss, but it stayed stationary in the sky. after about a few minutes some cirrusclouds past in front of it and although the 'star' was a bit less visible, but you could still see it changing in brightness. i therefore tried to focus on it -after the clouds where gone- with my camera (200mm lens) and took a photograph. the first photograph showed on zooming in on the camerascreen just a bright dot. i therefore took a second photograph and at zooming in i saw that it had a shape. 

when i looked up again, some more cirrus clouds passed but the object had dissapeared. i later saw some more aircraft flying past, but the appeared lower in altitude than the object.
content.summary: High altitude hovering ufo with bright lights above lyme park, uk

content.detailedDescription: I was in my work place which is a cow farm in a small village. i had just gotten there and it was very beautiful sunset so i took out my phone and decided to take some photos but after i had taken the photo i noticed something. there was this weird light in the sky. first i thought it was just a sunlight reflecting on the cloud but it didn´t look like a cloud and it also wasn´t moving. so i just stood there trying to figure out what it is. after some minutes the clouds started covering it and i took quickly one more photo. finally i couldn´t see it anymore and so i just left. i still have no idea what it could´ve been. if you zoom in the picture it almost looks like there´s some oval object with light around it but i´m not sure is this thing really looking like that or is this just because of the bad quality or something.
content.summary: Weird light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were photographing the perseid meteor showers on 8/12/17 at approximately 10pm est. she had the camera facing ne toward where the showers were best viewed. i was sitting down behind her watching her set up the camera when an extremely bright light flashed in the northern night sky toward polaris. i saw this out of the corner of my eye and when i turned toward it, it was gone. i asked my wife if she saw it and she replied she didn't. it was by far the brightest light in the sky.... by far. approximately 5 minutes later i saw the extremely bright light flash on, then off again this time more to the west. i asked my wife if she saw it and again she did not. i then asked her to leave her camera and come watch with me. another 5 minutes or so passed and this time we both saw it. it was back almost due north but lower in the sky. the main difference was the light this time was not as bright as the original brilliant flash but appeared as if someone was operating a dimmer switch because the light started out faint then glowed brightly, then off. immeditaly following this sequence, a much smaller (secondary) flash would instantly occur, always to the right and lower than the initial object - possibly a side view of the object? the initial brilliant flash of light that i mentioned originally may have been a front view because we could not see the secondary flash of light when this occurred. we watched this object for well over a half hour always following the same sequence of no light to dim light, to brighter light always followed by the smaller secondary flash of light. it seemed to go back and forth from a front view with the brilliant light to a side view with the light acting as if were being operated on a dimmer switch. the secondary flash was only visible on the side view theory. when the "side view" light glowed on it appeared there actually some sort of shadow behind the light. possibly indicating an object behind the light? when the light disappeared, you couldn't see anything where the object may have been and when it reappeared with the flashing sequence it was always in a different location in the sky. initially the light started out to the north, high in the sky, then to the west at different altitudes, back to the north, then southwest until it turned to the east, flashed one more sequence then disappeared. my 21 year old son came out and got to see about 15 minutes of this event. i have been an amateur astronomer for many years. i know what planes and helicopters look like at night. 
i can also easily pick out satellites passing overhead so i know what they look like as well. this object was unlike anything i have ever seen. this object was very high in the sky. it followed no type of flight pattern. once it went dark you wouldn't see it again until it flashed the light in a completely different part of the sky from when we last saw it. i have never claimed to see a ufo before but this was strange enough that i felt i needed to reach out to someone else.  very strange. please contact me if you would like to discuss further. my wife was able to get several pictures of this object on her camera. we viewed these pictures and you can clearly see the light and the irradic behavior of the flight of whatever this object was.
content.summary: The light would appear from faint to glowing bright. a smaller flash would immediately follow.The smaller flash was always lower and to the right of the main object. an extremely bright light would occur when the object was possibly facing my wife and me

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was sit on my front steps playing music on my ipad
2) i had a feeling to look up
3) a triangle ufo
4) it wasn't the 1st time of seeing a ufo, so i wasn't to concerned 
5) i've been lucky enough to have seen many ufo's
6) it was just sitting there, i went back to doing other things
content.summary: I had a feeling to look up and saw, thought that shape was not normal and took a couple of pic's

content.detailedDescription: On the night of aug 4th, both my wife and i observed a light just hovering. thinking that it was an aircraft we watched and then realized it wasn't moving. it would change colors from blue to red not quickly like a/c lights. then it seemed to lose altitude, then rise to it's original position. then from a standing stop it shot out towards the west at an incredible speed i have not seen in all my 38 years in the air force, then it returned to it's original position then slowly descended out of line of sight. i just wanted to know if there had been any reports on this incident   thanks
content.summary: On the nite  in question approx 2145hrs both my wife and observed a hovering light s.E. of our location. we watched as it shot away from it's hovering position towards the west, then returning to it's original position then falling behind mountain range

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: While watching the meteor shower my wife andrew i noted what looked to be a tumbling or spinning thing moving in a zig zag pattern at possible same altitude of satellites. it was observed by at least 4 other people. we have no idea what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
My gf and i were outside on our back patio enjoying the evening stargazing and talking like we usually do. i noticed what looked like 3 stars in the north east. one star was brighter than the other 2, and this persisted for several minutes without movement. then the brightest of the 3 stars started moving, slowly at first. i asked my gf if she could tell if it was moving or if it was just me. she agreed and i suggested she get our binoculars from the house. however just as she went inside the object picked up speed heading east and upwards growing dimmer and then it was gone. 

when she came out i told her about it leaving and we continued our conversation. i was pointing up to the area of the sky where it disappeared explaining to her that it just sped out of sight heading higher and growing dimmer then it was gone... and shortly in that same area of the sky a bright object  just "popped" in out of nowhere, and started heading north at a very high rate of speed. (faster than an airplane) we watched it until it passed out of sight.

during the evening (we were outside for about an hour or so) we noticed a few shooting stars, and at least one satellite move over head. there were no other recognizable objects in the night sky while we were outside.
content.summary: Star like object hoverred then left the area, then returned and left again.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside monitoring the perseid meteor shower last night and i saw a bright flash out of the corner of my eye while talking to me wife.  i immediately said "oh, shooting star".  30-45 seconds later, i saw it again and then starting looking that way.  i didn't say anything to my wife at this point.  while watching, it pulsed again probably 40-60 seconds later.  i then pointed it out to my wife and we both began to monitor it.  we watched at least 5-6 pulses like this in the same location.  it was not moving, but pulsing on some cadence.  the pulsing was more like a lighthouse.  the light would be off and slowly pulse to a very bright light and then off.  the pulse was probably 3 seconds worth total each time, from nothing to bright to nothing.

it appeared quite high.  many airplanes flew under it while we watched.  after 5-6 pulses, it began to very slowly move east.  it would stop occasionally, move north a bit and then back east.  we could only see its direction by watching for the pulses.  there was no visible craft or flashing lights like an airplane would have.  only the pulse.  over the course of 30 minutes of monitoring, it only moved a total of 1ft of our visibility of the horizon, not very far.  no aircraft i'm aware of can do what it was doing.  

after the 30 minute mark, the light stopped pulsing and that was it.

hands down, the most amazing thing we've ever seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering and slow flying ufo.  very high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio just looking at the sky and i started to see this light flashing. this is the second time i've seen this. my family and i witnessed this same experience maybe 2 years ago when we were watching an eclipse but we were not able to get a picture or video. last night i did. i'm always waiting to see something cause i know there are entities out there . i notice the light and ran to get my phone and my daughters to witness it as well. it lasted maybe 6 minutes and just stopped.
content.summary: Flashing light not moving in the way a plane does. but more like a couple of dancing stars.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on our patio to have a cigarette around 830 pm. we are avid amateur astronomers and often track the iss and iridium satellites. i notices a light moving from south to north directly overhead that was moving at about the same speed of a satellite except i'm used to satellites moving from north to south so it caught my attention. it was not a commercial aircraft because i'm used to seeing them as high as 45,000 and i can still make out the blinking of a commercial or private aircraft. there is almost zero light pollution where we live so it was, as i thought, a satellite. it had all of the characteristics of a satellite (straight line of motion, no blinking) until it would slow down and appear to "skip" from side to side. i called my wife out to witness it. she also noticed the slowing and skipping motion it made. since it was dark, it's hard to judge distance but, again, it moved and looked just like a satellite until it slowed and skipped. we watched it disappear over the horizon. total duration was about 6 minutes from when i first noticed it at about 80 degrees from the south. it was almost directly overhead and very high (in orbit or re-entering the atmosphere) if i had to make a judgment.
content.summary: Appeared to be same characteristic of a satellite except it "skipped" with small directional changes

content.detailedDescription: I observed three different objects orange glowing light in color fly from the direction of the lake north over our house andis end up until disappeared. we were in our front yard and watched it fly from our front yard to our back yard and disappear in the distance. we first thought that the objects were drones or something to that effect but after looking at the internet we observed what a lot of other people have put on the internet. the objects seem to be hovering and spinning and moved across the sky almost like they were floating or buoyant. we had mixed emotions i'm scared some excited and really confused. then the objects one at a time i send it up very quickly and disappeared.
content.summary: We absorb three objects fly over our house coming from lake madina

content.detailedDescription: While observing perseids meteor shower, spotted a light in the northeastern sky.  the light was stationary and pulse slowly, like a lighthouse or beacon.  occasionally, the light would flash quickly and very brightly.  it appeared to be high in the sky, and we could not see the object itself.  there was no sound.  after about 10 minutes, it moved off slowly to the east, then abruptly vanished.
content.summary: Stationary pulsing light hovering in the northeastern sky then moving to the east

content.detailedDescription: I woke up because the thunder was very loud outside. i looked out the window and thought i saw something green in the sky, so i grabbed my cellphone camera at 6:20 am and began filming the lightening storm. i first focused to my left where i thought i saw a green light in the sky and sure enough, though hard to make out with my naked eye, i could see the green orb moving about very quickly and erratically, definitely not an airplane. it zipped to the right then dove down almost like a meteor burning out, but then it reappeared again, zig-zagging around. as i panned across the sky during the storm i picked up another orb, which i didn't see until i reviewed my video and zoomed in to take a closer look at the green orb i had seen initially. it was more white and also made similar movements going from high in the sky, sideways, up and down, even visible during lightning flash. during the sighting, i couldn't believe what i was seeing, i even thought i was misinterpreting a speck of dust on my cell phone or after affects of lightning on my eye, but i had my fiance watch it when he got up and he saw them both as well without me pointing out what i saw. i was very excited as i have never seen something like this in my entire life, but have always believed ets to be real and very present. after seeing it i feel truly blessed. i felt very happy and oddly enough "playful" is the only word i can think to use to describe what i saw and how it made me feel. soon, i didn't see the green orb anymore, nor the white one so i stopped filming.
content.summary: Green orb moving fast and erratically. dove down to horizon, then saw another white orb nw higher as well in video during filming lightening storm

content.detailedDescription:
I've been harassed and bullied in the past two weeks, multiple sightings, multiple objectcs vontaining lifeforms (assumed) initiate of trasncandental mrditation. black project victim. the third party has to be punished for what they do to innocent american civilians. they are horrible. also saw *classified* technology that is in posession by third party.

driving, at home, at another person's home. 
open sphere, psychic contact. 
multiple sightings, life forms / potential ships appeared in visions before hand.
feeling of comlkete astonishment, fear, love, need to teach and explain, paranoia of deception.
content.summary: Unify us.

content.detailedDescription:
Disclaimer: i'm not drawing any conclusions as to what these were, i'm open to all possibilities.

here is an explanation of what we're looking at because the video really doesn't do justice to how these things were moving:

these are 7 videos put together that stretch between 7:06pm - 7:22pm on 8/10/17.

i first noticed these things in the sky while walking out to my car around 6:50pm. there were a dozen or so, high up, and looked to be moving like balloons or lanterns. living close to the beach and the pier, i see a lot of balloons and lanterns so i'm familiar with them. anyway, i ignored them at first because i was in a hurry to move my car. by the time i finished (around 7:00) and walked back down the path the numbers of them in the sky increased by another couple dozen - and there were a number of them quite low to the ground.

at this point i thought: advertising stunt of some kind (we get those a lot in la too). it wasn't until i got back to my door that i saw a whole "fleet" of them coming in on what looked like a flight path (disclosure: we are close-ish to lax and the santa monica airport and i'm familiar with the flight paths - you'll see a number of planes in the video). as if they were coming from the upper atmosphere (over the pacific) and down towards pico blvd essentially. at this point i thought "skydivers" or "flares"... and went inside and grabbed my binocs.

when i looked through the binocs (i have two pair, one with a stabilizer one with extra magnification) i expected to see lanterns, flares, balloons, or even drones or skydivers. instead what i saw were sparkling rings of smoke that had some shape and apparent structure, but they spun like tops in the sky as they moved. they almost had a jellyfish type body that seemed to pulse and was translucent. once i pulled out the binocs and saw this, four "zoomers" (what i called them) buzzed down from the sky (above the palm tree in the long shots for reference) and skimmed above the roof of the building directly in front of me (only a couple hundred feet in altitude). they were silent, and moved incredibly fast (way too fast, as you'll see) to be a lantern or balloons - and then they climbed in elevation after buzzing the roof.

i was alone, though my neighbor saw it as well. i should have gotten more people outside to be honest. mistake on my part. but these clips in the video are broken up because i was going back and forth between filming and watching through the binocs. i stated this in the video, but will say it again, this video does not do justice to how many of them there were in the sky. it was a constant flow, on a "flight path" seemingly of these things for 30 minutes or longer. it lasted a long time, and had to be seen by more than me.

i slowed some of the clips down at the end, the one zoomer i got and another slow motion vid of how they move in the sky (you'll see it tumbling @ the 1:51-1:57 mark).

time stamps:
first thirty seconds are kind of tough, showing the higher altitude ones that had just buzzed me
:40 second mark you see some new ones coming in, lower and closer.
:55-:57 mark you can kind of see the movement (like balloons) as well as the pulsing.
1:51 - 1:57 mark you will see one moving across the top, spinning, it gives you some of the shape
2:11-2:17 mark you can see more movement (these are new ones, not the same as the ones above)
3:15-3:26 mark good shot of one close, moments after it buzzed the path i was standing on, moves like balloons... but way faster and they're glowing.
3:33-3:52 mark has another one dipping low, then a zoomer (the only one i got on film, but there were several others) that flew past real fast. this one is slowed down at the end and zoomed in as best i could. 
*4:35-5:21 mark has three more coming in on the "flight path". by that i mean, you see how they're high in altitude and moving lower. that's how most of them came in, in a straight line from that high altitude and then down where they spread out, then reformed into a line and moved on at a lower altitude. this also includes the description of these things.

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Orb like sighting of 50+ objects over santa monica ca on 8-10-17.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While looking ne towards seabrook nh i noticed kaleidescope colors in the 
 east that seemed out of place.I grabbed binoculars and saw a spinning saucer object just above tree line.It moved erraticly,coming towards me turning into a orb shield around it. a triangle ship appeared over the tree line hovering. you could see red and blue lights blinking on its bottom side. it then shot up behind my condo at lightspeed.I hear humming and pounding noises and pulsing humming sounds.A celestrial star shape with green in the middle turns sideways and appears 100 yards away.Ive seen these objects for 3 years.Im a former army mp.What i saw is accurate.It has affected my dreams and daily life.I have had a meeting with a celestrial being while stationed at my duty station,i will take a lie detector test.I believe i was abducted after my encounter 1989 while on duty.There are over 25 visible ones that only i seem to notice. triangle formation with a ufo at each point.Objects can be seen going up to them and the other takes off and gets replaced.I had a triangle ship hover in daylight hovering over the trees across the river.Please help.I have video and pictures.I used a hd camera with tracking software.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several triangle orbs that change to a pulsating crystal. circle ufos that spin red,blue.Yellow colors. several v shape formations with saucers that seem ti move when pointed at.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with a friend going back to the town of carver, she told me to take this odd side street which led us to a big open view of the night sky. my friend looked out the window and noticed a giant sphere like object in the sky sitting, not doing anything. we stopped for about five minutes and looked at this orb in the sky. it emitted a yellowish orange and gold light which made it look like the sun if we were up close to it. when we had first stopped we thought it was a star, but after sitting there for a while it just seemed odd as it was brighter than the northern star which is the brightest star in my hemisphere. it made us feel extremely eerie. after we left we were driving and we confronted another object in the sky. it had the similar look of a plane, but it was flying way to low to the ground and was completely silent. it had to green lights on it and one red one in the middle. it was going a speed of around 15-20 kilometers per hour.
content.summary: Country siting

content.detailedDescription:
Looked like a star but then realized it was actually moving. then assumed it was a jet but after about 20 seconds or so ,i realized it just disappeared. thought it might have been cloud cover but clouds were minimal . light did not reappear . i find myself looking up at the sky frequently 
in the evenings. looking for anything unusual. this is probably the first time in this area that i do ...
content.summary: Looked like a star but then realized it was actually moving. then assumed it was a jet but after about 20 seconds or so ,i realized it just disappeared. thought it might have been cloud cover but clouds were minimal . light did not reappear

content.detailedDescription:
sunday evening and i just fed my dogs, when a friend called me from edmond about 20 miles away at 8:19pm. she asked me if i could see the bright light that she and her boyfriend were observing from their back yard as we spoke. i put my glasses on and stepped onto my north porch while still on the phone. i asked the direction to look and they said it was almost directly above them, which is to my ne. i then observed in the sky at about 70 degrees, a very bright light in the direction of their location, edmond. 
    at first, i thought it was venus, but it was in the wrong location. the sun had just gone down, but no stars were visible and the sky was blue. then i thought it may be a reflection of an airplane, as i have 3 small and 1 international airport within 25 miles. although the sky was clear on that half, the curvature of the earth was obstructed by an on coming storm front, and the sunlight could not pass through it. 
    at this point over a minute had passed as the object moved very slowly in a westward direction. the speed was too slow for conventional aircraft, it was nearly hovering,  it had no flashing lights and was not on any of the regular aircraft flight paths. i continued to watch the object while talking to my 2 friends on the phone as we three witnessed the event from our dual locations. 
    after observing the object for approximately 5 minutes, the object started to fluctuate slightly in light intensity. the object, in all this time had not moved more than 3 degrees off origination point. a total time of over 5 minutes had passed by now, when the object started to blur slightly.  over the next 20 seconds the bright object faded from view, as if it were pulling away at high speed. 
    the event was over at 8:25pm. i then observed the sky and discussed the object on the phone with co-witnesses for another 6 minutes.There were still no stars visible and no aircraft in the area at that time. 
    i live outside of town were it is relatively dark at night, and this not my first ufo sighting. on the contrary, i have seen many and i am an expert in light and photography.  this one has at least 3 observers so i decided to report it.
content.summary: Friends called 20 miles away, we witnessed orb move slowly forward(westward)simultaneously including disappearance

content.detailedDescription: Unable to sleep, i got out of bed at approximately 4:00 a.M. and went downstairs to the window bench to sit and look out of the living room window for awhile. there was no wind or rain and it was quiet in the wee hours. suddenly, a bright small light about the size of a softball or a bit larger appeared in my peripheral vision so i focussed my attention on it. in retrospect, it was as if my neighbour (to the right) tossed a bright ball from their balcony upstairs and into the trees. it travelled a bit slower than if it was a softball and judging by it's arc, it seemed weightless so i knew it wasn't anything like a baseball or softball. it was all very strange and i have never seen anything like that before. it all happened quickly but it left quite an impression on me.
content.summary: A very bright, small object

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at camp tehama in mineral,ca... a sober living men's retreat. a strange object in the night sky caught my eye, when i pulled my iphone to take a picture. i looked again to get additional pictures but the object was out of site
content.summary: Strange object in the sky... took a pic and then it vanished within seconds

content.detailedDescription:
The location is cottontown (walnut grove), tn which is just northeast of white house, tn and approximately 30 miles north of nashville.  the sky was mostly clear with a few stray clouds and contrails with no thunderstorm activity within a hundred miles of the area.  at approximately 21:40 on 12 august 2017, i observed a bright white flash of light in the north, northeast portion of the sky at approximately 45 degrees.    it appeared as if a star had flashed on and off and the size comparison of the light was the same if not marginally larger than a star.  as i continued to look in the sky i observed a couple of more flashes over the course of a minute or so.  i walked back into the house and told my wife what i had seen.  i asked her and my children to join me on the front porch to see if it continued and if possible to record and hypothesize what it could be.  at approximately 21:45 the light flashes had moved from the original point in the sky to nearly directly overhead.  as we watched the flashes continued in intervals of several seconds.  a couple of the flashes appeared as strobes or camera flashes.  at one point a streak of light appeared in what i could only explain as a bluish white laser or fluorescent bulb in the sky in the same vicinity.  the entire event lasted only about six or seven minutes from start to finish.
this is not the first time that i had observed an occurrence like this.  approximately a year ago in the same general area and the same time of year, i saw what appeared as a star flashing on and off every few seconds.  a short time before this i saw a similar event take place on the southwest horizon from our property.  researching several videos on the internet to find a reasonable explanation for what i had witnessed, here is what i found:
1.	iridium flare – while a solid hypothesis at first, upon reviewing videos online and reading the description of what it is and how this appears, this does not look at all like what we witnessed.  the flashes we witnessed were brighter, crisper, and strobed while the iridium flare “warmed up and cooled down” over the course of a few seconds.  the lights we saw literally were like camera flashes.
2.	air traffic – we witnessed several air craft traversing the sky while this was occurring, and since we are in the flight path of traffic in and out of nashville international airport, it was another good hypothesis.  however, the aircraft lighting, many of which are now led, did not appear the same as the lights we saw nor did they have the same characteristics as the lights we observed.
3.	lightning – there was no lightning in the area and no thunderstorm activity.  the sky was mostly clear and mild with good visibility.
4.	meteor – while this was the reason that i was outside watching the sky in the first place, this was not meteor activity.  the flashes were predictable and were easily distinguishable from meteors.
as i continued to research other ufo reporting sites, i came across a few others who observed similar flashes.  these reports were from michigan and louisiana.  interestingly, the location where we saw the lights is nearly at (within a thousand feet of) the line of totality for the upcoming eclipse.  coincidence or not, this was very strange.  we are very curious to know what this was and to know if more saw the same thing.  meanwhile, we will continue to watch the sky for more examples of this and will report our findings.
content.summary: Brilliant flashes of light observed in the sky in middle tennessee by 5 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the moon/stars while camping/hiking in a remote area of british columbia (manning park).
as i sat, a fuzzy event happened over my head.  only the moon was visible, when stars were about before.
i saw a ufo hovering in a tree above me.
i took a picture, then returned to my tent...Somewhat afraid, but not terrorized.
i fell asleep, and experienced weird engineering dreams. when home, i looked at the images i took, and the ufo was clearly above me, yet the sky seemed to have a cloud around...Several orbs were visible in this fuzziness, as well as the moon.  the orbs had geometrical patterns inside, and one looked like it was a link to another world, as there were building inside, but after boosting size/contrast, it was hard to identify.  after that, i've taken photos near my home in the city, and have many shots of orbs appearing. 
one of the photos has a sort of white geometric netting that would fit perfectly over a circle...If you look closely, a faint object can be seen under the white overlay.  the other photos shows two close orbs, and one further away.  i have other photos of the orbs.
i also thought i saw the same lights from the original ufo on a clear night while in vancouver.  this seems to be interested in me.
content.summary: Top-like ufo hovered in tree above me, a tall  west-coast evergreen

content.detailedDescription: Very speed light come close to vega star toward ne.Its look like star in sky but this one move and change direction two times .Sky was clear no clouds too.I call someone in street to see what i'm seen because it's hard to make myself crazy as i don't believe in this .But might someone  interested about this.
content.summary: Direction from vega star toward ne
